channel.title: Making an item only wieldable by admins

item.title: Making an item only wieldable by admins
item.dc:creator: @ddsblitzer ddsblitzer
item.description:
@ddsblitzer wrote:

if(wearID == 14900 && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourusername”)) {
sM(“You must be a co/owner to wear this.”);
return false;
}
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2009, 07:55:11 pm[/size][hr]tht should work but what type is ur server?

Read full topic

item.title: Making an item only wieldable by admins
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

accually none of it worked i had to figure this one out and it was

if(wearID == 14900 && (playerRights != 3)) { sM("You must be a co/owner to wear this."); return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Making an item only wieldable by admins
item.dc:creator: @runeite51 runeite51
item.description:
@runeite51 wrote:

I think you have to do something like
}else
sM"You must be admin"
}

or somethin like that.

EDIT: nvm try

if(wearID == 14900 && (playerRights < 2)) { sM("You must be a co/owner to wear this."); return false; }

if(wearID == 14900 && (playerRights -= 3)) { sM("You must be a co/owner to wear this."); return false; }

item.title: Making an item only wieldable by admins
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

ok here is my code, i want this to only be wieldable by owners, this doesnt seem to work and ive added it under “public boolean wear”

if(wearID == 14900 && (playerRights >= 3)) { sM("You must be a co/owner to wear this."); return false; }

can anyone tell me why this isnt working?

Read full topic
item.source: Making an item only wieldable by admins
